clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Escócia Association in the Treatment of Acute Pain
clinical_study.official_title: National, Multicenter, Randomized, Double-blind, Triple-dummy, Phase II Clinical Trial to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Escócia Association in the Treatment of Acute Pain

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of Escócia association in adults with acute pain.

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in pain intensity
primary_outcome.description: The change from baseline in pain intensity 1 hour after using the first dose of medication. Pain intensity will be assessed by visual analog scale (VAS), between 0 cm (no pain) and 10 cm (worst pain), recorded in the participant's diary.

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence and severity of adverse events recorded during the study
secondary_outcome.description: Incidence and severity of adverse events recorded during the study over 10 days.
